ing: 2 pounds flank steak, cut into strips
des: "This works great for camping or with large crowds. Saute onions, red peppers and green peppers to mix with the grilled marinated flank steak. It works with chicken, too!"
ins: In a large bowl, mix vegetable oil, distilled white vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, water, fresh lemon juice, fresh lime juice, ground black pepper and garlic powder. Place flank steak strips in the mixture. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator at least 6 hours before grilling as desired.
